Layout

px-mobile

The px-mobile library provides various classes and web components that are used in mobile hybrid/web applications.

Usage
Typography
Grid
Grid Classes
Transform
  • .opacity-[0|25|50|75|100]
  • .scale-[0|50|100|105]
Hover
  • .hover-color-[option]
  • .hover-background-color-[option]
  • .hover-background-color-[lighter|darker]
  • .hover-opacity-[0|25|50|75|100] to mo
  • .hover-scale-[0|50|100|105]
  • .hover-btn-outline
  • .hover-btn-outline-reverse
Transitions
  • .transition-[all|background|color|opacity|transform]
  • .transition-[linear|ease|ease-in|ease-out|ease-in-out]
  • .transition-[normal|fast|slow|slow-2x|slow-4x]

Buttons
Forms
Cards

.card-head

A container with classes.card-content and.card-header

Using.card-header adds a thin border on the bottom of the header section. It also spaces your heading tags and paragraph tags nicely for titles and subtitles.
